homePage.presentation: I'm Lucie, UX-UI Designer looking for new design opportunities!
homePage.myJobDescription: I use UX Design methods to create designs that take into account the humans who interact with them.
homePage.UIExpertise: Creation of wireframes, mock-ups & prototyping. Creation of graphic guidelines and digital visual identity.
homePage.UXExpertise: Research and analysis of user behavior. Personas, user journey, user interviews, etc.
homePage.DSExpertise: Set up a Design System with the relevant teams, maintain and improve components and processes.
homePage.UXWritingExpertise: Improving the quality of written communication and the user experience conveyed by words.

Projects.myProjectsDesc: Find out more about my achievements and the approach I've taken to these various projects, whether they're for school, personal or professional purposes.

Experiences.logiroadTopic1: Creation of a web platform for road management professionals
Experiences.logiroadTopic3: Creation and maintenance of a Design System

Studies.masterDesc: UX methods, UI design, user sociology, usage ethnology, anthropology, user behavior analysis…
Studies.bachelorDigitalDesc: UX design, webdesign, HTML-CSS, digital communication & marketing, DTP software training…
